issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.ghacks.net/2025/08/19/firefox-142-ships-with-tracking-protection-tab-groups-and-extensions-improvements/#comments](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ghacks.net%2F2025%2F08%2F19%2Ffirefox-142-ships-with-tracking-protection-tab-groups-and-extensions-improvements%2F%23comments) ### Comment > on the "ghacks.net" webpages, when i click the button to open "comments," it doesn't open, to display comments ie user-feedback. > > i don't seem to be able to figure out a way to unblock the blocking of comments. ``` Username: @redwolfe98 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/8ssps5o7eosg8owkc0g4k0g4sgkgc4c3cn07nx5jks.jpg?nc=1)
